para.text: The items in the Archive menu are intended to be used after the archive structure is complete and descriptions have been assigned to everything in the archive structure.

Each folder under "model" in the archive structure will have a description associated with it. This command will export those descriptions to a text file. This command can be useful if the user wishes to update the readme file that has already been put in an archive without creating an entirely new archive.

Every folder and file in the archive structure will have a description associated with it. This command will export those descriptions to a text file. This command can be useful if the user wishes to update the readme file that has already been put in an archive without creating an entirely new archive.
This command will show the user the sum of the sizes of all the files in the archive.
